background.title: AI Agents Are Reshaping Research Paradigms
background.paragraph1: Society supports scientific research because exploration expands the boundaries of human knowledge, bringing technological innovation that benefits humanity. AI Agents are becoming the transformative engine of intelligent research.
background.paragraph2: Unlike traditional tools that provide point-based assistance, research AI agents can drive and integrate literature reading, model computation, experiments, and other workflows, truly achieving the transition from 'can do' to 'know how to do'. Scientists will have cross-domain, cross-system AI research partners to help integrate knowledge and solve problems; repetitive work will be completely freed, and innovative ideas will be proposed, verified, and iterated faster.
background.paragraph3: Research AI agents may introduce new evaluation and incentive models for intellectual achievements. The basic unit of work output gradually transforms from static papers to dynamic, executable agents. These agents form a real-time flowing value network through high-frequency mutual invocation.

feature1.title: Cross-domain Collaboration
feature1.description: AI research partners help integrate knowledge and solve interdisciplinary challenges

feature2.title: Efficiency Boost
feature2.description: Repetitive work is freed, innovative ideas are verified and iterated faster

feature3.title: Value Network
feature3.description: Agents invoke each other, forming a real-time flowing value network

feature4.title: New Evaluation
feature4.description: From static papers to dynamic agents, evaluation becomes more real-time and objective

tracks.title: Two Tracks, Independent Evaluation
tracks.description: Choose the most suitable track based on your expertise and application scenarios
tracks.note: Each team selects a track during registration. Both tracks are evaluated and awarded independently

deep.title: Deep Research Track
deep.subtitle: Domain-specific Applications
deep.description: Focus on specific disciplines such as materials, chemistry, biology, and simulation to solve professional research problems

general.title: General Research Track
general.subtitle: Cross-disciplinary Scenarios
general.description: Address general research scenarios across disciplines, including literature reading, data analysis, and experiment management

evaluation.title: Data-Driven + Expert Review
evaluation.description: Unique dual evaluation system: real user feedback meets professional expert judgment

objective.label: Objective Data
objective.title: Platform Revenue Performance
objective.description: Your work must not only tell a good story but also win users over. We evaluate the actual value of works through real platform data.

expert.label: Expert Review
expert.title: Professional Evaluation
expert.description: A panel of experts from research and technology fields conducts professional evaluation from multiple dimensions.
expert.metric1: Innovation: What has been done that others haven't
expert.metric2: Completion: The degree of product maturity
expert.metric3: Practical Value: Usability in real research scenarios

criteria1.title: Innovation
criteria1.description: The degree of innovation in technical approach, application scenarios, or solutions

criteria2.title: Completion
criteria2.description: Product maturity, stability, and user experience

criteria3.title: Practical Value
criteria3.description: Practicality and promotion potential in real research scenarios

highlight.title: Why This Evaluation Method?
highlight.description: We believe good research tools must not only be innovative but also truly help researchers solve problems. 50% objective data ensures works withstand market validation, while 50% expert review ensures technical depth and innovative value are recognized.

vision.description: Competitions may have winners and losers, but good ideas should not be abandoned due to time constraints. Through this competition, we hope to incubate, grow, and sustain more excellent research AI agent projects.

point1.label: From Papers to Agents
point1.description: Promote the transformation of research evaluation systems, making the value of intellectual achievements more real-time, objective, and accurate

point2.label: Continuous Support
point2.description: 200,000 yuan Incentive program fund pool, giving excellent projects a second chance and supporting long-term development

rules.title: Open, Fair, Innovative
rules.description: We welcome all individuals and teams interested in research agent development

rule1.title: Eligibility
rule1.description: Open to researchers and developers worldwide, with no restrictions on location or professional background

rule2.title: Originality
rule2.description: Submissions must be original work by participants, without plagiarism or infringement of intellectual property rights

rule3.title: Content Standards
rule3.description: Submissions must comply with relevant laws and regulations, and must not contain any illegal, inappropriate content (such as violence, pornography, discrimination, etc.)

rules.noteSuffix: for detailed rules. Contact the organizing committee if you have any questions

prizes.title: Total Prize Pool ¬•1,000,000
prizes.description: Two independent tracks with generous prizes and continuous support for outstanding projects

timeline.title: Competition Timeline
timeline.description: From ideation to implementation, supporting teams throughout the journey

event1.title: Launch
event1.description: Phase 1: Creative design, development attempts, and online submission. Demonstrate the core value of research AI agents.

event2.title: Trials
event2.description: Conducted as an online defense. Select 25 teams from 100+ entries to advance to finals.

event3.title: Finals
event3.description: Top 30 teams compete. Two tracks evaluated independently across multiple dimensions, including innovation, completion, and practical value.

event4.title: Award Ceremony
event4.description: Final rankings will be announced and prizes awarded at the Beijing Science Intelligence Summit.

analytics.title: Competition Daily Leaderboard
analytics.description: Real-time tracking of competition rankings, participant statistics, and project performance
analytics.subtitle: Real-time Leaderboard Data

pricing.subtitle: Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that works best for you

item-1.question: Do you offer a free trial?
item-1.answer: Yes, we offer a 7-day free trial.

item-2.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
item-2.answer: You can cancel your subscription by visiting the billing page.

item-3.question: Can I change my plan?
item-3.answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time by visiting the billing page.

item-4.question: What is the refund policy?
item-4.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you are not happy with our product.

item-5.question: Can't find what you're looking for?
item-5.answer: Please contact our customer support team at support@mksaas.com

item-1.name: Jonathan Yombo
item-1.quote: MkSaaS is really extraordinary and very practical, no need to break your head. A real gold mine.

item-2.name: Yves Kalume
item-2.quote: With no experience in webdesign I just redesigned my entire website in a few minutes with tailwindcss thanks to MkSaaS.

item-3.name: Yucel Faruksahan
item-3.quote: Great work on MkSaaS template. This is one of the best personal website that I have seen so far :)

item-4.name: Anonymous author
item-4.quote: I downloaded the one of MkSaaS template which is very clear to understand at the start and you could modify the codes/blocks to fit perfectly on your purpose of the page.

item-5.name: Shekinah Tshiokufila
item-5.quote: MkSaaS is redefining the standard of web design, with these blocks it provides an easy and efficient way for those who love beauty but may lack the time to implement it.

item-6.name: Oketa Fred
item-6.quote: I absolutely love MkSaaS! The component blocks are beautifully designed and easy to use, which makes creating a great-looking website a breeze.

item-7.name: Zeki
item-7.quote: MkSaaS is the perfect fusion of simplicity and versatility, enabling us to create UIs that are as stunning as they are user-friendly.

item-8.name: Joseph Kitheka
item-8.quote: MkSaaS has transformed the way I develop web applications. Their extensive collection of UI components, blocks, and templates has significantly accelerated my workflow.

item-9.name: Khatab Wedaa
item-9.quote: MkSaaS is an elegant, clean, and responsive tailwind css components it's very helpful to start fast with your project.

item-10.name: Rodrigo Aguilar
item-10.quote: I love MkSaaS ‚ù§Ô∏è. The component blocks are well-structured, simple to use, and beautifully designed. It makes it really easy to have a good-looking website in no time.

item-11.name: Eric Ampire
item-11.quote: MkSaaS templates are the perfect solution for anyone who wants to create a beautiful and functional website without any web design experience.

item-12.name: Roland Tubonge
item-12.quote: MkSaaS is so well designed that even with a very poor knowledge of web design you can do miracles. Let yourself be seduced!
